title: [1.7.10][ssp]/[smp]LAST DAYS(高仿DayZ独立版) 末日mod-未漢化2月8日更新
author: a1486077529
txt_content:
本帖最后由 a1486077529 于 2015-2-12 19:36 编辑 

額= =因為看到豪寶寶的帖子之後下載下來提示說版本過久不能遊戲。。。。我就自己去原地址把最新版本轉載下來了= =更多詳情請看http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=359518&highlight=DAYZ
作者再次更新~

作者更新日誌Version: 

-0.0.7a 
[FIX] Fixed all known bugs. 
Server now work. 


-0.0.7 (First PRE-BETA version.) 
[NEW]Added smart moving support 
[NEW]NOW MOD NEEDED PLAYER API & RENDER PLAYER API MODS!!! 
[NEW]Added AKM 
[NEW]Added 9a-91 
[NEW]Added AK-74m (REINTRODUCING) 
[NEW]Added AK-74N 
[NEW]Added grenade 
[NEW]Added JNG-90 
[NEW]Added SVD (REINTRODUCING) 
[NEW]Added M4A1 (REINTRODUCING) 
[NEW]Added AKS-74U 
[NEW]Added ACR 
[NEW]Added many cool attachments for guns 
[NEW]Added flashlight 
[NEW]Added corpse 
[NEW]Added some blocks 
[FIX]Added some new backpacks 
[NEW]Added new loot system (ALPHA) 
[NEW]Added new GUI in game and some changes in others 
[FIX]Opening container crashes 
[FIX]Fixed bugs. I do not know how many... But i think more 750 
P.S. I can't remember all changes :P 

F切换视角
G打开枪械制作
shift +右键捡东西
= =沒什麼人氣呢。。
